text: Heartbreak Hotel is the 641st episode of The Simpsons and the second episode of season 30. The episode was written by Matt Selman and Renee Ridgeley. In the episode, Marge Simpson and Homer Simpson show up in a reality television show. == References == Category:The Simpsons (season 30) episodes Category:2018 television episodes
title: Heartbreak Hotel (The Simpsons)
